about_the_game:
Folia: The King's Revelry is a breathtaking 2D platform game that transports players to one of the greatests Brazilian festivals. As Talia, you'll use your elegant and fluid movement abilities to explore stunning hand-drawn environments, uncovering the mysteries of the Folia de Reis.

Along the way, you'll encounter simple and fun puzzles and platforming sequences. As you progress through the game, you'll gain new abilities that will allow you to interact with the environment in new ways and access new areas. You'll also encounter a variety of charismatic characters who will need your help on their own journeys.

With immersive storytelling and relaxing gameplay, Folia: The King's Revelry is a peaceful and enjoyable experience. The emotional depth of the characters' journeys adds a unique layer to the game. The music enhances the immersive experience with unique Brazilian soundtrack.

Overall, Folia: The King's Revelry is a unique and captivating game that celebrates the culture and traditions of Brazil. Its stunning art and immersive storytelling make it a must-play for fans of platformers and anyone looking for a beautiful and relaxing gaming experience. So join Talia on this journey to reunite with Stella and help bring revelry back to the world!

Folia: The King's Revelry is being developed with support from Proac, through Edital ProAC Nº 33/2022 offered by the State of São Paulo.
